programme.title: The Mighty Quinn
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars as a cop working to clear his friend's name of murder and theft.

programme.desc: Determined not to forget his roots, a future NBA star throws a cookout in his new neighborhood.

programme.desc: A Chicago dad (Mike Epps) moves his family to Beverly Hills just before the city's annual purge.

programme.desc: An stand-up comic moves to L.A. to pursue a film career after clips of his act make him an online sensation.

programme.desc: A campus culture war at a predominantly white school comes to a head after an offensive Halloween party.
